topic.title: Appendix Amendments to the Basis for Conclusions on other IFRSs

p.i: This appendix contains amendments to the Basis for Conclusions on other IFRSs that are necessary in order to ensure consistency with the revised IASÂ 1. Amended paragraphs are shown with the new text underlined and deleted text struck through.
The amendments contained in this appendix when this Standard was revised in 2007 have been incorporated into the relevant IFRSs published in this volume.
